ygData.subject: Re: Specialization....
ygData.msgSnippet: Specialization is not currently working.  Goto www.station.sony.com/everquest choose a method to browse the site, click on Features, then on In Development.
ygData.messageBody:
Specialization is not currently working. Goto
www.station.sony.com/everquest choose a method to browse the site, click on
Features, then on In Development. You will then see all the new changes and
upcoming changes to be made to the skill system and to some of the spells.
Hope this helps ya ;)

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Elkantar The Wizard <the_elkantar@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 9:18 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Specialization....


> From: "Elkantar The Wizard" <the_elkantar@...>
>
> Is specialization working or not. I hear that it is the saving grace of
> wizards then I hear that it is disabled. What is the real truth. Don't
reply
> if you don't have first hand knowledge. We need answers not speculation.
>
> Elknatar
